Class Client

Mastodon API client.

Using axios for request, you will handle promises.

Hierarchy

  • Client

Implements

  • Interface

Constructors

constructor

  • new Client(baseUrl: string, accessToken?: string | null, userAgent?: string, proxyConfig?: ProxyConfig | false): Client
    • Defined in src/mastodon/api_client.ts:41

    Parameters

    • baseUrl: string

      hostname or base URL

    • Default value accessToken: string | null = null

      access token from OAuth2 authorization

    • Default value userAgent: string = DEFAULT_UA

      UserAgent is specified in header on request.

    • Default value proxyConfig: ProxyConfig | false = false

      Proxy setting, or set false if don't use proxy.

    Returns Client

socket

  • socket(path: string, stream: string, params?: string | null): WebSocket
    • Defined in src/mastodon/api_client.ts:302

    Get connection and receive websocket connection for Pleroma API.

    Parameters

    • path: string

      relative path from baseUrl: normally it is /streaming.

    • stream: string

      Stream name, please refer: https://git.pleroma.social/pleroma/pleroma/blob/develop/lib/pleroma/web/mastodon_api/mastodon_socket.ex#L19-28

    • Default value params: string | null = null

    Returns WebSocket

    WebSocket, which inherits from EventEmitter

stream

  • stream(path: string, reconnectInterval?: number): StreamListener

  • Implementation of Interface.stream

    • Defined in src/mastodon/api_client.ts:276

    Receive Server-sent Events from Mastodon Streaming API. Create streaming connection, and start streamin.

    Parameters

    • path: string

      relative path from baseUrl

    • Default value reconnectInterval: number = 1000

      interval of reconnect

    Returns StreamListener

    streamListener, which inherits from EventEmitter
